items.content_html: A lightweight, NextJS-based CRUD API for managing product data. This repository contains a simple yet comprehensive backend implementation that demonstrates RESTful API principles using Next.js API routes.

items.content_html: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.
items.title: colddsam/Truth-Guardian: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.

items.content_html: SIEM Log Generator A lightweight and flexible log generation tool for simulating real-world security events. Easily produce logs in formats such as Syslog, Windows Event Logs, and CEF to test SIEM use cases, fine-tune detection rules, or populate security labs. Perfect for SOC training, threat detection validation, and purple team exercises.

items.content_html: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
items.title: SamarthKulkarni20/keyed-batched-items-accumulator: A lightweight utility for Node.js projects that accumulates items into fixed-size batches per key, preserving insertion order within each key. Streams items directly into their respective batches at runtime, eliminating the overhead of post-processing 1D arrays into chunks. It abstracts key-based batch management.
